items.name: Trainer Frame: Mist
items.description: Waterfall border inspired by Cerulean Gym.

items.name: Trainer Frame: Helix
items.description: Fossil etchings from the deepest Mt. Moon caverns.

items.name: Bike Skin: Surf Blue
items.description: A shimmering blue bike skin with surf wax decals.

items.name: Badge Glow: Cascade
items.description: Adds a soft glow to earned badges on your trainer card.

items.name: Cavern Lure (10m)
items.description: Boosts encounters for existing cave dwellers without adding new species.

items.name: Mist Lure (10m)
items.description: Increases water encounters around Cerulean routes.

items.name: Follower PokéDoll: Clefairy
items.description: A bobbleheaded Clefairy doll that hovers behind you.

items.name: Sound FX Swap: Moonwave
items.description: Chiptune arpeggios replace the Center healing jingle.

items.name: Battle Intro: Mint Scan
items.description: Adds a mint-colored scan effect to battle intros.
